languages.text: Whenever {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g}'s ally, the Bounty Hunter gains +<u>prey's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g}</u>% damage against that prey for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Stacks.
languages.original_text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}добыча{/g} наносит {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} союзнику охотника за головами, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}охотник за головами{/g} получает +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}ранг{/g} добычи</u>% к урону против этой добычи на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}. Эффект суммируется.

traits.locale_text: Whenever prey deals damage to a Hunter's ally, the Hunter gains +<u>(prey's difficulty tier)%</u> damage against that prey for 2 rounds. Stacks.
Whenever prey deals damage to a Hunter's ally, the Hunter gains +<u>prey's difficulty tier</u>% damage against that prey for 2 rounds. Stacks.

Whenever {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g}'s ally, the Bounty Hunter gains +<u>prey's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g}</u>% damage against that prey for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Stacks.

Whenever {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g}'s ally, the Bounty Hunter gains +<u>prey's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g}</u>% damage against that prey for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Stacks.

languages.text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}добыча{/g} наносит {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} союзнику охотника за головами, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}охотник за головами{/g} получает +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}ранг{/g} добычи</u>% к урону против этой добычи на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}. Эффект суммируется.
languages.original_text: Whenever {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g}'s ally, the Bounty Hunter gains +<u>prey's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g}</u>% damage against that prey for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. traits.locale_text: Когда добыча наносит урон союзнику охотника, охотник получает +<u>уровень сложности добычи</u>% к урону против этой добычи на 2 раунда. Эффект суммируется.
Когда добыча наносит урон союзнику охотника, охотник получает +<u>уровень сложности добычи</u>% к урону против этой добычи на 2 раунда. Эффект суммируется.

languages.text: 每当{g|Encyclopedia:Prey}猎物{/g}对{g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}赏金猎人{/g}的盟友造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，赏金猎人对该名猎物造成的伤害提高<u>猎物的{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}难度等级{/g}</u>%，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。此效果可叠加。
languages.original_text: Whenever {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g}'s ally, the Bounty Hunter gains +<u>prey's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g}</u>% damage against that prey for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: 每当猎物对猎人的盟友造成伤害时，猎人对该名猎物造成的伤害提高<u>猎物的{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}难度等级{/g}</u>%，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。此效果可叠加。

languages.text: Cada vez que la {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}presa{/g} inflija {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} a un aliado del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}cazarrecompensas{/g}, este gana +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}nivel de desafío{/g} de la presa</u> % de daño contra esa presa durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}. Este efecto es acumulativo.
languages.original_text: Whenever {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g}'s ally, the Bounty Hunter gains +<u>prey's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g}</u>% damage against that prey for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que la {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}presa{/g} inflija {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} a un aliado del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}cazarrecompensas{/g}, este gana +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}nivel de desafío{/g} de la presa</u> % de daño contra esa presa durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}. Este efecto es acumulativo.

languages.text: Wenn die {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Beute{/g} einem Verbündeten des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Kopfgeldjägers{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zufügt, erhält der Kopfgeldjäger 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}Schwierigkeitsstufe{/g} der Beute)</u> % Schaden gegen diese Beute. Stapelbar.
languages.original_text: Whenever {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g}'s ally, the Bounty Hunter gains +<u>prey's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g}</u>% damage against that prey for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn die {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Beute{/g} einem Verbündeten des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Kopfgeldjägers{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zufügt, erhält der Kopfgeldjäger 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}Schwierigkeitsstufe{/g} der Beute)</u> % Schaden gegen diese Beute. Stapelbar.

languages.text: Chaque fois qu'une {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}proie{/g} inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} à un allié du {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}chasseur de primes{/g}, le chasseur de primes bénéficie de +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}niveau de difficulté{/g} de la proie</u> % de dégâts contre cette proie pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Cumulable.
languages.original_text: Whenever {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g}'s ally, the Bounty Hunter gains +<u>prey's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g}</u>% damage against that prey for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois qu'une proie inflige des dégâts à un allié du Chasseur, le Chasseur bénéficie de +(<u>{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}niveau de difficulté{/g} de la proie)</u> % de dégâts contre cette proie pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Cumulable.

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Prey}獲物{/g}」が{g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}バウンティハンター{/g}の味方に{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与えた時、ハンターは2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、その「獲物」に対するダメージが+<u>(獲物の{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}脅威度{/g})</u>%増加する。この効果はスタックする。
languages.original_text: Whenever {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g}'s ally, the Bounty Hunter gains +<u>prey's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g}</u>% damage against that prey for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Prey}獲物{/g}」が{g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}バウンティハンター{/g}の味方に{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与えた時、ハンターは2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、その「獲物」に対するダメージが+<u>(獲物の{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}脅威度{/g})</u>%増加する。この効果はスタックする。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Av{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Ödül Avcısı{/g}'nın dost birimine her {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verdiğinde Ödül Avcısı'nın o ava verebileceği hasar +%<u>avın {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}zorluk derecesi{/g}</u> kadar artar. Bu etki 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer. Etki üst üste birikebilir.
